alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 11:18PM CDT until September 24 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1118 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stroud, moving east at 40 mph. Another severe storm was located 3 miles southeast of Carney, also moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Stroud, Davenport, Carney, Warwick, and Kendrick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
